Check Field Log(s)BB Sites; DSM;RBM
Micromet Truck Book here, contact Rick for calendar access
Site Keys Kept in the lab with the truck keys
Field Laptop Charge overnight; bring Ethernet cable w/ USB converter dongle, RS 232 cable w/ serial bus converter dongle, charger, DC>AC power converter
USB Sticks One per site - ensure its empty and formatted
Wildlife Camera One empty and formatted SD card + 8 AA batteries per site
Cleaning Supplies Blue wipes + washer fluid - brine enough to leave on site if needed
Desiccant 5 bags per site
Water Table Probe Bring yellow manual probe from lab
Waders/Boots Waders necessary at BB sites except in summer; Boots are usually okay at DSM & RBM
First Aid Kit Red first aid kit kept in ponderosa lab

Site Specific

DSM & RMB Bring tool kit and 7700 calibration shroud lab
BB Sites Check fire rating; ensure participants are permitted

Season Specific

Summer Fire extinguisher; Water + spray bottle; Wasp Spray
Winter Torch or deicing fluids for locks; Head lamp; Spare socks
